character - level ConvNets.from sentence: The most important conclusion from our experiments is that character - level ConvNets could work for text classification without the need for words .

dataset.from sentence: Traditional methods like n-grams TFIDF remain strong candidates for dataset of size up to several hundreds of thousands , and only until the dataset goes to the scale of several millions do we observe that character - level ConvNets start to do better .

Conv Nets.from sentence: Conv Nets may work well for user - generated data .

Choice of alphabet.from sentence: Choice of alphabet makes a difference .

Semantics.from sentence: Semantics of tasks may not matter .
